#######################################
## CM LL BB BB
## 	     BB BB = Brightness
##     LL       = LED
##  CM          = CMD
## --------------------------------
## D ##           = Device    
#######################################

# =====================================
# Device 00 
D 00






# =====================================
# LED Rainbow

# RED on
91 00 10 08 00
91 03 10 08 00
91 06 10 08 00
91 09 10 08 00
91 0c 10 08 00
91 0f 10 08 00

93 2d 10 08 00
